metadata.Meta description: Discover the significance of CHKROOTKIT and Linux AIDE in maintaining system security. Learn about identifying rootkits, LKM trojans, intrusion detection, file integrity, and the critical role of the Mhash library. Explore the setup, commands, and troubleshooting steps for these essential tools.
Learn how to apply patches, rebuild your kernel, and manage system processes in the Unix environment. Explore insightful articles and advice on system administration and development.

Learn how to apply patches to the kernel, rebuild the kernel, and execute kernel-related functions such as stopprofclock, fdcloseexec, and execsigs. Enhance your understanding of kernel operations and maintenance.
Learn how to apply patches, rebuild your kernel, and execute commands in the sys kern directory. Stop profiling and handle close on exec with ease.
Learn about patching cron software, configuring files like cron.h, and executing commands using cron_popen. Understand error handling and task scheduling in Unix-based systems.

Discover the process of applying patch files to the cron job scheduler, including modifications to config.h, cron.h, and do_command.c files. Learn how to reinstall the scheduler and explore the functionality of the cron_popen() function within the context of system administration.
Applying patch updates to cron application, modifying code in config.h, cron.h, and do_command.c files to enhance functionality.
